name: Prototype Santa
description:
It's time for christmas, unforntally santa is sick. We will have to use a prototype robot aided by a gnome operator, to deliver presents to all the kids in the world.

“If a kid doesn't get any presents for christmas the world will end.”

Acording to Billy

Controls

  • Hack surveillance camera - Aim at a monitor and left click to hack a camera.
  • Exit camera - Click space to exit a camera.
  • Throw gingerbread - Left click on any location to throw gingerbread. Hold down to throw further.
  • Traps - Trigger the traps with gingerbread to move prototype santa forward.
  • Bonus points - Throw gingerbread at halloween decorations to raise the christmas spirit and get extra points.
  • Feed santa with gingerbread - Throw gingerbread prototype santa to make it move faster and to gain bonus points.
  • Combo - A combo meter will go up when prototype santa moves and go down when it gets trapped.
  • High Score - if you have the highest high score we will send a special present to you delivered by prototype santa itself!

Credits

  • Programming - Joel Nykänen, Nils Ek, Oscar Lundberg
  • Level Design - Christoffer Lundberg
  • Concept Art - Jakob Gabriellson
  • Textures - Samuel Grenehed
  • Minimalist Christmas
